results.title: Australian diary. No. 123
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan, Australian National Film Board and Dept of the Interior
results.brief_description: Magazine items: The giant telescope at Parkes, N.S.W. is the largest in the Southern Hemisphere. It is occupied with a fulltime research programme into radio astronomy. At Collaroy, Sydney, the Salvation Army has organized a unique Music Camp for children,from eight to fifteen years. University College of Townsville is the first in the state of Queensland outside Brisbane.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 122
results.brief_description: Magazine items: The Australian Consumers’ Association test on the durability of children’s shoes; a display in South Australia for prospective buyers and pilots of light aircraft; a dazzling exhibition by Horace lindrum, last of five generations of Lindrums, all of whom have proved masters on the billiard table.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 121
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: Models give insight to work at Woomera and into the work of Australia’s part in the British Commonwealth Defence Plan; a wartime Army Tank Carrier converted into a hopper barge dredges Coralline from the bed of Moreton Bay and transports it up the Brisbane River to a cement manufacturing company; a new Cub pack forms in Canberra.

results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: an insight into the art of the furrier; life saving serum is milked from deadly snakes as an antidote to snake-bite and a modern farm is run by a group of Mission Sisters.

results.title: Australian Defence Scientific Service: 1969 report
results.creator_credit: John Carter, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: The Australian Defence Scientific Service undertakes research in various fields. In the laboratories of the Weapons Research Establishment and other Commonwealth scientific areas, shows the research in thin film optics, and high-speed photography in the testing of explosives and munitions.
